Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'You were wondering about one thing when you were on the transport craft.'}
{3: '"How many steps are there to stop the mechanoids from fighting an art war?"'}
{3: 'Ayla only said one thing during the mission briefing.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'That one thing overthrew all previous plans, and the new one began heading in an unusual direction.'}
{3: 'Which is how you become an audience of Ayla\'s legendary "win streak."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I suppose Commandant and I have won this fight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machines', 3: 'We admit defeat.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mechanoids surrounding the pink figure on the street drop their paint sprayers one by one.'}
{3: 'This is not the first time it has happened today.'}
{3: 'According to the plan, you have to take out WGAA\'s custom megaphone every time Ayla charges into "battle" and provoke the mechanoids.'}
{3: '"Let\'s decide the winner with art!"'}
{3: 'Afterward, Ayla will start painting leisurely amidst the mechanoids.'}
{3: 'There is always a commotion and loud declarations to ambush Ayla, but that is as far as things go the way you expected.'}
{3: "As Ayla's brushes gradually cover her canvas with paint, all squabbles turn silent. By the time she finishes her painting, the silence turns into cries."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: "We'll never win. We'll never win.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'Dammit! Is this the end for me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Awakened Machine', 3: 'I should never paint again...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The defeated mechanoids all give up on fighting and stand still as if they have malfunctioned.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Meanwhile, the person who started it all spins around gracefully and waves a victory sign at you with her right hand.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Suppression complete, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Respond with the same gesture)', 3: '37'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "We'll stop them with art, then.", 4: '1'}
{3: "That is Ayla's plan."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'School of Ayla. Members: 2. Fighter: 1. Win rate: 100%.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark', 3: 'What Ayla has done is really impressive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark', 3: "She's chosen nature as her theme, knowing how the Schools of mechanical art cannot grasp it in such a short time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mark', 3: "She's minimized the differences between the Schools by maximizing what they do not understand.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Why aren't you talking to Ayla about this?", 3: '51'}
{2: 'Mark', 3: 'Mark is just a road maintenance bot. Mark knows nothing about art.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He is clearly heartbroken when he says that.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant! Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla squeezes through the large crowd of awakened machines with her tools, seemingly planning to leave behind her work.'}
{2: "Aren't you taking your painting with you?", 3: '57'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's alright. Everyone here genuinely loves art.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Didn't you say it yourself, Commandant? We should spread our ideas with art! I like that plan a lot!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mark', 3: 'In a way, Ayla can be very cruel...', 4: '1'}
